## pedigree summary
```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(data.table)
library(visPedigree)
ped = dat
ped[ped==0] = NA
id = ped[,1]
sire = ped[,2]
dam = ped[,3]
try(tidyped(ped),silent = T)
```

### duplicate ID
```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
id[duplicated(id)]
```

### One use both as Sire and Dam 
```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
intersect(sire,dam)
```
